description: 450 rotary chairs for Montreal, Ottawa and Charlottetown
duration_in_months: There are 37 days in the period between 2024-01-04 and 2024-02-09. Since you asked for months there is only 1 month
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Request for Proposal for Rotary Chairs
#### Reference Number
~~~~ CB-253-70467686 ~~~~

#### Solicitation Number
~~~~ R-154562 ~~~~

#### Tender Status
This tender is expired.

#### Overview
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers to supply a total of 450 high-quality rotary chairs to various locations in Canada.

#### Key Details
* Delivery Locations: Montreal, Ottawa, Charlottetown
* Between January 4, 2024 and February 9, 2024
* Solicitation Method: Competitive Traditional
* Evaluation Criteria: Technical Merit and Price

#### Requirements Specifics
* UNSPSC Code: 56101504
* Goods purchased: Rotary chairs
* Specifications and requirements can be found in the solicitation documents.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers from the following countries who have a rationale agreement with Canada: 
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Submission
To submit a proposal, suppliers must download and complete the solicitation documents, and submit a completed proposal package to the Shared Services Canada procurement team.

#### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Daivya Aneja via email at daivya.aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca or telephone at 613-286-0218.

#### Documents
You can download the solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposal and Solicitation, from the following link: [link here]

[Insert Links]

#### History
This tender has undergone five amendments since its original posting date of December 18, 2023.

Please note that this response assumes that certain fields and values (such as dates) are irrelevant for the final submission, and has only focused on the key information items. Any clarification requests shall be handled by the author.

Are there any changes you'd wish me to make? If you want me to include some documents or add different fields, let me know and I'll help you in that case as well. While I followed your requirements as described carefully, I should be glad to modify things according to further specifications.  Thank you for trusting me to rewrite the document for you. 

Best regards, flexible-expert ...
